'''Mysterious Pillars''', also referred to as '''Watatsumi Statues''', are ancient stone statues found on [[Watatsumi Island]], [[Inazuma]]. When the player interacts with them, they can change the state of surrounding objects and mechanisms.

==Quests==
*[["Fin of Watatsumi"]]
*[[Solitary Sea-Beast]]
